Package com.chess.board

Class Move.PawnPromotion

java.lang.Object
com.chess.board.Move
com.chess.board.Move.PawnPromotion
Enclosing class:
Move
public static class Move.PawnPromotion
extends Move
PawnPromotion class is a child class of Move It follows the decorator design pattern to add functionality to the pawn

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)
    As stated before we want Object equality rather than reference equality which is the default for java.lang so we override the equals() method to suit our needs
    Board execute()
    execute() method is an override method from the parent class to create a new board to show the new state of the board and the difference here is that instead of a pawn in the promotion squares a selected major piece is found on the tile where the pawn should be.
    Piece getAttackedPiece()
    getAttackedPiece() is being override here in the case that it has capture a piece to get to the pawn promotion square
    int hashCode()
    Override the hashCode() to allow us to call it anytime
    boolean isAttack()
    isAttack() is being override here to see if the move attacks another piece
    java.lang.String toString()
    The toString() method is to show the move made which will be important for the GameHistoryPanel class wherein you can see the moves made by the players and we use the standard chess notations

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)
      As stated before we want Object equality rather than reference equality which is the default for java.lang so we override the equals() method to suit our needs
      Overrides:
      equals in class Move

      Returns:

    • execute

      public Board execute()
      execute() method is an override method from the parent class to create a new board to show the new state of the board and the difference here is that instead of a pawn in the promotion squares a selected major piece is found on the tile where the pawn should be. Specifically in this program we automatically promote to a Queen since it has the highest rate of piece to be promoted into
      Overrides:
      execute in class Move
      Returns:
      a new board showing the new state of the game using the Builder class

    • isAttack

      public boolean isAttack()
      isAttack() is being override here to see if the move attacks another piece
      Overrides:
      isAttack in class Move
      Returns:
      a boolean value if the move is an capturing move or not

    • getAttackedPiece

      public Piece getAttackedPiece()
      getAttackedPiece() is being override here in the case that it has capture a piece to get to the pawn promotion square
      Overrides:
      getAttackedPiece in class Move
      Returns:
      piece being attacked if there is one

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      The toString() method is to show the move made which will be important for the GameHistoryPanel class wherein you can see the moves made by the players and we use the standard chess notations
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      a String to show the move specifically when a pawn piece captures another piece
